1.title: Road Trip
1.plot: Team RWBY goes on a road trip without Lie Ren and Jaune, who are then picked up by Cinder Fall. / Velvet Scarlatina makes fun of Peter Port on his own show.

2.title: Evil Interview
2.plot: Cinder Fall interviews Cardin Winchester for a nonexistent position in her evil organization. / Taiyang Xiao Long does online dating with the help of his family.

3.title: Mortal Frenemies
3.plot: Zwei has to take his medicine. / Qrow Branwen amuses himself at the expense of Winter Schnee.

4.title: Grimm Passengers
4.plot: Mike and Marty pretend to be human hitchhikers. / Ruby Rose does a PSA about puns.

5.title: Girls' Night Out
5.plot: Mercury Black talks to a Cinder sockpuppet. / Team RWBY goes "dancing".

1.title: Ruby Makes Cookies
1.plot: Ruby attempts to make cookies. / Ruby finds a book Blake's been reading. / Weiss attends a literal session of 'Pin the Tail on the Donkey'. / Rigorous training between Weiss and Yang ensues.

2.title: Cat Burglar
2.plot: The police try to track down a mysterious Cat Burglar. / An attempt at a pool party goes wrong. / Blake and Yang make a jump rope for Ruby. / Yang gets Blake an embarrassing present. / A daring battle between Zwei and Blake commences.

3.title: Reloading
3.plot: Jaune attempts to call Weiss. / Ruby tries out some dust. / Jaune Part 2 / Yang plays tag with Blake. / Jaune Part 3 / The battle between Zwei and Blake continues.

4.title: Fighting Game
4.plot: Ruby and Yang play a fighting game. / Ruby tries her hardest at an ice sculpting contest. / Yang gets Blake a present. / Weiss won't stop annoying Yang.

5.title: Sissy Fight
5.plot: A costume party raises some complaints. / Blake tries to clean her ears. / Ruby and Weiss have a fight. / Team RWBY notice some odd people.

6.title: The Vacuum
6.plot: Weiss vacuums Team RWBY's room. / Ruby encounters some trouble with her cape. / Blake has a problem with her bed design. / Nora breaks the fourth wall.

7.title: Prank Wars
7.plot: Unsatisfied with his own weapon, Crocea Mors, Jaune takes Team RWBY's weapons for a spin. / When her teammates prank her by dropping ice-cold water on her head, Weiss Schnee retaliates by dropping a bucket of solid ice on Ruby Rose's head, knocking her out cold. / Lie Ren, Yang and Nora are thrown out of the arcade when they use their weapons at the shooting gallery and "Whack-A-Grimm".

8.title: Magnetic Personality
8.plot: Ruby tries to open a jar of pickles without much success. She eventually resorts to using Crescent Rose to cut the jar open, but the pickles turn out to be dill flavor, much to her disgust. / Dissatisfied with her figure, Yang starts a rigorous physical exercise regime to get into shape. However, Nora manages to keep in shape without any effort at all, to Yang's great annoyance. / Pyrrha has trouble with her magnetic Semblance, such as sending metal objects flying when surprised, interfering with compasses on a hiking trip and demagnetizing VHS tapes. / Team RWBY ...

9.title: Ren Plays Tag
9.plot: Ruby wants to do stuff with Weiss, but she's too busy studying to entertain her hyperactive partner. After several failed attempts to get Weiss' attention, Ruby eventually resorts to flopping around on her study desk like a fish. / Team JNPR plays a game of tag. When Lie Ren becomes "it", he puts himself through a disciplined martial arts training regime for his comeback. With his preparations finally complete, he tags Nora, but she simply tags him back immediately.

10.title: Love Triangle
10.plot: Jaune asks Weiss if she would like to study with him for an upcoming exam, but she turns him down. Pyrrha then asks Jaune to study together, but he turns down her offer. Finally, Weiss approaches Pyrrha with the same question, but is also rejected. Lie Ren looks on, lamenting that they all fail to see what's right in front of them. Nora Valkyrie, holding up a sign saying "NOTICE ME!", angrily agrees.

11.title: Nurse Ruby
11.plot: Weiss is sick and asks Ruby to get her medicine. Ruby instead gets her home remedies like her dad used to, including a warm glass of whole milk, video games and a motivational poster of a cat. When Yang finds out Weiss is sick, she also runs to get her more milk, much to Weiss' disappointment.

12.title: Little Red Riding Hood
12.plot: Narrated by Ozpin, Team RWBY puts on a warped stage production of Little Red Riding Hood for Team JNPR. Ruby plays Little Red Riding Hood, Yang plays her grandmother, Blake Belladonna plays the Big Bad Wolf and Weiss plays the axe-brandishing woodsman, with Zwei acting as stage hand. The production is plagued by Yang's attention-hogging acting, Blake and Weiss' lack of enthusiasm, and Ruby's awful writing. The play ends when Ozpin realizes that they should actually all be in class.

13.title: Spin the Bottle
13.plot: Team JNPR, Weiss and Neptune play spin the bottle. When Jaune spins, it almost lands on Pyrrha and then Weiss, but it eventually settles on Lie Ren. Ren pauses before stoically taking a breath spray and turning to Jaune.

14.title: Big Vacation
14.plot: Weiss is at the airport alone, about to depart on a beach holiday. Ruby joins her uninvited, followed by a huge group of other people she brought along. This includes Sun, Jaune who wants to play beach volleyball, Yang who wants to tan, Blake hungry for fish, Nora playing pirate, Ren dragging a hydrophobic Neptune along, and Zwei appearing out of Ruby's luggage with a shirt on.

15.title: Neptune's Phobia
15.plot: Neptune's crippling phobia of water extends to small puddles, rain and showers. When Neptune covers for Sun as a pool life guard, Jaune falls into the pool and drowns while Neptune pretends not to notice.

16.title: Bike Race
16.plot: In a street race refereed by Blake, Yang rides her motorcycle and Ruby rides in a cart pulled by Zwei. Both sisters make fun of Weiss when she joins on a pink tricycle. However, just before the race begins, Weiss freezes both Yang and Ruby's vehicles with Myrtenaster and pedals off to victory.

17.title: Save Nora!
17.plot: Nora feigns being attacked by a Beowolf, hoping to be saved by Ren, but she keeps getting rescued by other people (first Sun, then Yang Xiao Long). Ren eventually comes across Nora tormenting an unfortunate Beowolf and amusedly comments that she never ceases to amaze him. Nora takes this as a compliment and enthusiastically hugs the Beowolf, "breaking" it.

18.title: Evil Plans
18.plot: Cinder Fall and Emerald Sustrai openly draw up their "Ultimate Evil Plans" on a whiteboard in their dorm room. When they are paid an unexpected visit by the overly friendly pair of Ruby and Nora Valkyrie, they successfully play off their evil scheming as a recipe for a cake to be given to a kitten charity, despite Mercury Black at one point walking in with a "Kitten Killer 9000" rocket launcher.

19.title: Pillow Fight
19.plot: Sun Wukong, Neptune Vasilias and Ren rejoice when they find out that Team RWBY are having a pillow fight. However, they are disappointed by the melodramatic performance, complete with hammy death scenes. The three boys decide to have a dainty pillow fight of their own. Ruby disapprovingly calls them all amateurs.

20.title: Roman's Revenge
20.plot: Roman Torchwick and Neopolitan get ready to have their revenge on Team RWBY, but Zwei foils their evil plan.

21.title: Cinder Who?
21.plot: Ruby forgets Cinder's last name, leading to a number of visual puns, including Cinder "Mall", Cinder "Falls", Cinder "Doll", Cinder "Stalls" , Cinder "Lols" and Cinder "Bawls"

22.title: Security Woes
22.plot: At an airport, Cinder Fall and Emerald Sustrai get through security without an issue, but Mercury Black gets held up at the metal detectors and x-ray machine due to his prosthetic legs.

23.title: A Slip Through Time and Space
23.plot: Ruby Rose makes Nora Valkyrie a cup of coffee, but Lie Ren warns her too late that Nora has too much energy and isn't allowed any more caffeine. Nora falls to the floor and slides through multiple different parallel universes where characters are swapped and things are slightly different, including one resembling real life. When Nora finally regains consciousness, she finds herself stuck in a universe where Ren talks with Ruby's voice and Zwei talks with Jaune's.

24.title: The One with a Laugh Track
24.plot: Weiss Schnee gets annoyed at Ruby Rose for playing with a paddle ball in the dorm while she's trying to study. Yang Xiao Long spies on the boys showers, but ends up "blinded" when Professor Port enters instead. Jaune Arc asks Weiss Schnee out to the dance, but is predictably turned down. The sitcom then pauses for a commercial break, where Pyrrha Nikos advertises Pumpkin Pete's Marshmallow Flakes, followed by Roman Torchwick and Neopolitan advertising Neo's Neo, an ice cream flavor (which contains poison). When the show resumes, Sun Wukong successfully asks Blake ...

1.title: Director Ozpin
1.plot: The Opening of the show is sabotaged by Cinder Fall, Mercury Black and Emerald Sustrai and where Ozpin ignores all the warnings Team RWBY are giving him. / Jaune Arc, Nora Valkyrie and Pyrrha Nikos manipulate Akouo to simulate an UFO on a compost king board game. / Ruby Rose, Blake Belladonna, Yang Xiao Long, Jaune, Zwei, Sun Wukong, Neptune Vasilias, Penny Polendina and Nora play dodgeball.

2.title: Geist Buster
2.plot: Yang Xiao Long and Ruby Rose ask Blake Belladonna for her books only to end up using them to construct a fort in a battle with Jaune Arc and Lie Ren. / Neptune Vasilias and Sun Wukong discuss how Sun manages to keep his badge clean. / Roman Torchwick and Neopolitan attack Beacon's students with a Geist that ends up being eaten by Nora Valkyrie after it possesses some pancakes.

3.title: Magic Show
3.plot: Ruby Rose and Jaune Arc have a magic-off in order to decide which of them is the better magician. / Pyrrha Nikos finds a penny on the ground and picks it up for good luck, followed by Ruby carrying her own kind of Penny. / The Villains and Heroes face off in pairs for a soccer match, but never get to play because Mercury Black accidentally destroys the only ball in the first move.

4.title: Dad Jokes
4.plot: Neptune Vasilias plays a video game and loses to an unknown rival who turns out to be Sun Wukong. / Velvet Scarlatina and Ruby Rose test out the abilities of Velvet's Weapon. / Taiyang Xiao Long and Yang Xiao Long scare away Lie Ren, Neptune and Sun with terrible jokes while Nora Valkyrie is unconscious from a waffle overdose.

5.title: Girls Rock!
5.plot: Jaune Arc, who is equipped with Ember Celica, Magnhild and Ruby Rose's cape, and Zwei save Velvet Scarlatina from Roman Torchwick, Neopolitan, Mercury Black and Emerald Sustrai but have to leave when Yang Xiao Long, Nora Valkyrie and Ruby get angry. / Ruby tries to discipline Zwei with a dog whistle without thinking about the Faunus. / Team RWBY and Nora start a band but are pestered by Taiyang Xiao Long during practice.

6.title: Super Besties
6.plot: Ruby manipulates the rest of her team by talking to them while they are asleep. / Roman cannot stand having to use a different hat while his own is being dry-cleaned. / Blake waits in line excitedly to meet her favorite author.

7.title: Must Be Nice
7.plot: Ruby is late for Oobleck's class despite trying to sneak in to pretend to have always been there. / Nora tells Yang and Weiss the mental strain of being nice all the time. / Cinder tries to teach evil things only to explosively fail.

8.title: Boy Band
8.plot: Ruby tries to get Zwei to the veterinarian only for Nora to mess it up. / Taiyang tries to make a pun about wearing a tie-dye shirt. / Sun, Neptune, Lie Ren and Jaune try to start their own band but Neptune suffers an allergic reaction to latex.

9.title: Coming Home to Roost
9.plot: Qrow tries to enter Team RWBY's dorm through the window multiple times in his crow form. / People protest for many reasons with no clear goal while Neopolitan just teases the audience about her lack of a voice. / Yang teaches Jaune to be more assertive only for him to take it too far.

10.title: Cool Dad
10.plot: Qrow upstages Taiyang, who can't even handle liquor, in terms of coolness. / A Geist tries to torment Neptune only to end up possessing a brush that Sun will use for showering. / Taiyang tries to upstage Qrow yet again in terms of coolness only for his daughters to talk him out of it.

11.title: Movie Night
11.plot: The characters have trouble deciding which movie to see. / Roman comments on Neopolitan cos-playing as Weiss, Ruby and himself.

12.title: Evil Genius
12.plot: Ozpin sends his students to retrieve misplaced objects under the guise of retrieving artifacts. / Peter praises all the students on their weapon upkeep except for Jaune who hits his weapon with an inflatable mallet. / Roman tries to use several gadgets to defeat Ruby only to unknowingly succeed in defeating her with frozen yogurt.

13.title: Parent Teacher Conference
13.plot: Qrow Branwen and Taiyang Xiao Long are called in by Ozpin due to an incident involving Yang Xiao Long, Ruby Rose, fire and cats.

14.title: Cannonball!
14.plot: Penny tries to cannonball into a pool only to end up hitting the concrete. / Team RWBY spends quality time with friends and family. / The two Beowolves Mike and Marty are annoyed by a flamboyant Geist named Floyd.

15.title: Nurse Nora
15.plot: Ruby, Yang, Weiss and Winter do sister stuff. / A mentally unstable Nora forces Lie Ren to pretend that his leg isn't broken.

16.title: Neptune Noir
16.plot: Cinder almost hires Neptune as an investigator. / Peter tries to teach survival tactics only to get upstaged by Winter. / Taiyang breaks several cameras whilst attempting to shoot a vlog.

17.title: The Mystery Bunch
17.plot: Team JNPR and Zwei imitate a certain group of crime solving teenagers.

18.title: The Fixer
18.plot: Taiyang guilt-trips his daughters into fixing things for them. / Pyrrha and Nora are better detectives than Sun and Neptune.

19.title: Steals and Wheels
19.plot: Neptune Vasilias gets hit by Yang Xiao Long for telling her that she is unlady like. / Roman Torchwick and Neopolitan start several faulty businesses. / Jaune Arc thinks he is on the run from the law.

20.title: Monsters of Rock
20.plot: Jaune Arc tags along with Sun and Neptune on Junior Detective business. / Winter and Qrow try to tutor Yang, Ruby, Jaune, Lie Ren and Sun on how to escape a locked room. / Roman forms a band with his accomplices.

21.title: Happy BirthdayWeen
21.plot: Geist possesses a pumpkin only to end up being a pumpkin pie. / Nora Valkyrie makes a love potion with a secret ingredient. / Ruby Rose uses a Halloween birthday to take advantage of her friends.

22.title: Battle of the Bands
22.plot: The battle of the bands turns out to be an actual battle.

23.title: A Slip Through Time and Space Pt. 2
23.plot: Nora drinks an even higher dosage of caffeine in the form of espresso shots.

24.title: Nondescript Holiday Spectacular
24.plot: Roman Torchwick tries to suck out everyone else's holiday spirit.

imdb.title: RWBY Chibi
plot: A spinoff of the popular rooster teeth show RWBY. This show is small clips of the cast of RWBY in their spare time.
